title: Vittoria buys A. Dugast, teases sustainable Dutch handmade L’Eroica tubular tires
content:
Vittoria’s buyout of handmade tubular specialist A. Dugast signals both their continued development of classic supple tire construction, and a new capacity to manufacture premium limited edition tires in Europe. That first special tire looks set to be a Vittoria x Dugast L’Eroica tubular, handmade in Holland and destined to be ridden glued up to […]

The post Vittoria buys A. Dugast, teases sustainable Dutch handmade L’Eroica tubular tires appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
